subject: International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology (IJAST) SCOPUS Q3 Indexed Journal

IJAST is trusted by more than 60,000 satisfied authors worldwide & growing rapidly. We are happy to invite you to submit your next article of your research/review/study in engineering research area under IJAST domain for publication upcoming issue of IJAST. Publication Fee USD 220 Submit manuscript by emailing us to ijast@sersc.org or submit online by the link below: Paper Submission Link: http://www.ijritcc.com/sendy/l/7763wC9IuFJ3763uqOqnowUIIA/PwdJ8tljigkaVoDRYgKPaA/ntp8fe5C7634D5KldPfe4n8w/about/submissions IJAST Manuscript Template: http://sersc.orgf/journals/downloads/PaperFormat(MS-Word).doc Thanking You, Editorial Team International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Unsubscibe using below link,  If Unsubscribe link is not working kindly reply us unsubscribe. International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology

ISSN: 2207-6360

Journal URL: http://sersc.org/journals/index.php/IJAST

SCOPUS: https://www.scopus.com/sourceid/21100829147

Call For Papers - November- 2019 (Paper Submission Deadline 10 November 2019)

IJAST is the one of the renowned, fully OPEN ACCESS International Engineering Journal with more than 200000 monthly content viewers. IJAST is trusted by more than 60,000 satisfied authors worldwide & growing rapidly.

We are happy to invite you to submit your next article of your research/review/study in engineering research area under IJAST domain for publication upcoming issue of IJAST.

Publication Fee USD 220

Submit manuscript by emailing us to ijast@sersc.org or submit online by the link below:

  • Paper Submission Link: http://sersc.org/journals/index.php/IJAST/about/submissions
  • IJAST Manuscript Template: http://sersc.orgf/journals/downloads/PaperFormat(MS-Word).doc

Thanking You,

Editorial Team

International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology
